data.title: Anthropic's AI Safety Team Raises Alarm: AI That Designs Vaccines Could Just As Easily Be Used To Build Bioweapons
data.description: The same tools that allow artificial intelligence to help design life-saving vaccines could also be used to build bioweapons, Anthropic’s head of the safety team said recently. Vaccines Or Bioweapons? Same Tech, Different Intentions “We focus on CBRN—chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear,” Logan Graham told CBS’s “60 Minutes.” in an interview aired last week. “And right now, we’re at the stage of figuring out, can these models help somebody make one of those?” He said Anthropic’s Claude AI
data.keywords: Anderson Cooper, Logan Graham, biological weapon, vaccines, uncomfortable truths, Claude AI, Dario Amodei
